How can the sentence "She danced around the room" be rewritten without using a pronoun? Here is some sample XML data to use as an example:
<paragraph>
    <sentence>
        <subject>My sister</subject>
        <verb>danced</verb>
        <preposition>around</preposition>
        <object>the room</object>
    </sentence>
</paragraph>
How would you rephrase this sentence using the given XML data format?

Based on the provided XML data format, the sentence "She danced around the room" can be rewritten without using a pronoun as follows:

```xml
<paragraph>
    <sentence>
        <subject>My sister</subject>
        <verb>danced</verb>
        <preposition>around</preposition>
        <object>the room</object>
    </sentence>
</paragraph>
```

In this rephrased version, "My sister" is used in place of the pronoun "She" to specify the subject of the sentence.
